Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:breasts) left breast covered in $(this.appearance:fur) $(this.appearance:furcolor) fur. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-breast) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-breast).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A left cheek.|A left $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheek.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-cheek) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-cheek).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A left ear.|A $(this.appearance:earshape) left ear.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-ear) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-ear).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A left earlobe.|A left $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobe.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-earlobe) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-earlobe).}

{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A left eyebrow.|A left $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrow.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-eyebrow) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-eyebrow).}
A set of $(this.appearance:eyelashes) eyelashes over a left eye.
A set of left fingers, with nails at the ends. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-fingers) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-fingers).}
A normal anthro's left fingertips. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-fingertips) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-fingertips).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A left hand.|A $(this.appearance:hands) left hand.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-hand) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-hand).}
A left index finger, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-index-finger) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-index-finger).}
A fingernail, at the end of a left index finger.
A normal human's left index fingertip. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-index-fingertip) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-index-fingertip).}
A set of left knuckles. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-knuckles) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-knuckles).}
A left middle finger, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-middle-finger) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-middle-finger).}
A fingernail, at the end of a left middle finger.
A normal human's left middle fingertip. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-middle-fingertip) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-middle-fingertip).}
The little finger on a left hand, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-pinky) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-pinky).}
A fingernail, at the end of a left pinky finger.
A normal human's left pinky fingertip. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-pinky-fingertip) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-pinky-fingertip).}
A pupil of the left eye.
A left ring finger, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-ring-finger) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-ring-finger).}
A fingernail, at the end of a left ring finger.
A normal human's left ring fingertip. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-ring-fingertip) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-ring-fingertip).}
The triangular bone across the upper left back of the body, connected to the collarbone. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-shoulderblade) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-shoulderblade).}
The left side, between the left ribs and the left waist. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-side) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-side).}
The sole of a left foot. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-sole) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-sole).}
A left temple, on the side of the forehead. {? | $(this.combat:injury:left-temple) |It has $(this.combat:injury:left-temple).}
A fingernail, at the end of a left thumb finger.
